title: rustdoc: unable to determine target arch from $CFG_COMPILER_HOST_TRIPLE
body:
I just built from source (b8b18aa). Then I run:

```
RUST_BACKTRACE=1 x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage2/bin/rustdoc src/librustc/lib.rs
```

Output:

```
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'unable to determine target arch from $CFG_COMPILER_HOST_TRIPLE', src/libcore/option.rs:704
stack backtrace:
   1:     0x7f5f25590760 - sys::backtrace::tracing::imp::write::hd89d31b61dd4636a0nu
```
